roomEditor.actsHelpText:
Acts allow you to structure your game's narrative and progression.

- Group rooms together: Assign rooms to the same Act to create distinct sections of your game.
- Control flow: Use puzzles to lock and unlock entire Acts, guiding players through the story.
- Presenter view: The presenter can easily navigate between Acts to manage the game.
